reactiveLayer

Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactiveLayer.NeuralNetwork

  • public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to model a topologically-organised lattice of neurons, resembling a 2D grid of neurons that are connected to each neuron in its Moore neighbourhood (its surrounding eight neurons). *
    • MDF = Monotonically Decreasing Function
    • A = Passive Decay Rate Constant
    • D = Euclidean Distance (1 or sqrt(2))
    • Some good parameter combinations for the shunting equation are:
      • A=0.2, MDF=1/6D
      • A=0.25, MDF=1/6D
    Version:
    v1.2
    Author:
    Chloe M. Barnes

      • updateActivations

        public void updateActivations(int[][] iotaGrid)
        Traverses the neural network and updates the activations based on the inputted iota grid, to create a hill-climbing landscape. The iota grid has the same width and height as the neural network and is filled with zeros unless:
        • A cell is marked as attractive, in which case the iota is very positive;
        • A cell is marked as repulsive, in which case the iota is very negative.
        Parameters:
        iotaGrid - A 2D grid that maps to the neural network structure, where values are either 0, +iota or -iota.
